Package org.openscience.cdk.io

Class XYZReader

java.lang.Object
org.openscience.cdk.io.ChemObjectIO
org.openscience.cdk.io.DefaultChemObjectReader
org.openscience.cdk.io.XYZReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, IChemObjectIO, IChemObjectReader, ISimpleChemObjectReader
public class XYZReader extends DefaultChemObjectReader
Reads an object from XYZ formated input.

This class is based on Dan Gezelter's XYZReader from Jmol

Source code:
main
Belongs to CDK module:
io
Keywords:
file format, XYZ

    • read

      public <T extends IChemObject> T read(T object) throws CDKException
      reads the content from a XYZ input. It can only return a IChemObject of type ChemFile
      Parameters:
      object - class must be of type ChemFile
      Returns:
      returns an object of that contains the content (or part) of the input content
      Throws:
      CDKException - it is thrown if the type of information is not available from the input
      See Also:
      • IChemFile

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: IChemObjectIO
      Closes this IChemObjectIO's resources.
      Throws:
      IOException - when the wrapper IO class cannot be closed.
